items.description: Job Description The Data Engineer leads the design, development, and maintenance of scalable and secure data architecture, pipelines, and systems to support the company’s data-driven initiatives. This role not only ensures the integrity, performance, and delivery of data solutions but also guides the broader data engineering team, mentors junior engineers, and drives innovation and best practices.
